books.title: Agile Web Development with Rails
books.author: Sam Ruby, Dave Thomas, David Heinemeier Hansson
books.description: Learn Rails the way the Rails core team recommends it, along with the tens of thousands of developers who have used this broad, far-reaching tutorial and reference.

books.title: Dive into Python
books.author: Mark Pilgrim
books.description: Whether you're an experienced programmer looking to get into Python or grizzled Python veteran who remembers the days when you had to import the string module.
